help.help_text: Information on how to use the pipeline

bins.description: Skip assembly and binning. Provide a directory with assembled bins fasta files

assembly.description: Skip assembly, do binning. (Prel) A directory with multiple assembly files or a fasta file

ref_genomes.description: A dir with fa  as reference genomes.

mean_cov_threshold.description: Min. mean coverage for a sample to match a pangenome
mean_cov_threshold.help_text: The coverage is estimated based on a subset of one million reads from each read-file from a sample and extrapolated based on number of reads. In other words, this value determined the expected average minimum number of reads on each position in the pangenome.

nr_samps_threshold.description: Minimum number of matching samples for a pangenome to be considered for further analysis
nr_samps_threshold.help_text: The minimum number of samples with good average expected coverage for a pangenome to be used for downstream analysis.

min_med_cov.description: Min. median coverage for a sample to a pangenome to be used
min_med_cov.help_text: Median coverage is based on the alignment of all of a samples reads to a pangenome. This value determines the minimum required median coverage and the downsampling ratio. Samples that pass the median coverage and breadth checks will be downsampled for even coverage between samples, and used to analyse variants within a pangenome.

min_breadth.description: Minimum breadth for a sample to a pangenome
min_breadth.help_text: Breadth is based on the alignment of all of a samples reads to a pangenome. Samples that pass the median coverage and breadth checks will be downsampled for even coverage between samples, and used to analyse variants within a pangenome.

max_contam.description: Maximum contamination for a MAG/bin to be used for pangenome creation

project.help_text: The name of your project. Creates a directory with this name, where results will be stored

samples.help_text: A tab-separated file with sample names in column 1, fastq file names in column 2 and readpair in column 3.

fastq.help_text: The path to the directory containing the raw fastq reads

threads.help_text: Assign how many threads the pipeline can use at a time

motu_creation.title: mOTU creation
motu_creation.description: Settings for mOTUlizer and taxonomy parser

MAGcomplete.description: Min. completeness of high quality MAGs
MAGcomplete.help_text: Decides which bins/genomes are used to build the mOTU in mOTUlizer. Lower quality bins can still be recruited to mOTUs.

MAGcontam.description: Max. contamination of high quality MAGs
MAGcontam.help_text: Decides which bins/genomes are used to build the mOTU in mOTUlizer. Lower quality bins can still be recruited to mOTUs.

min_mOTU_MAGs.description: Minimum amount of MAGs necessary for a mOTU to be used for further analysis
min_mOTU_MAGs.help_text:
Sets how many genomes need to be part of the same mOTU for that mOTU to get it's own directory in the results mOTUs directory and to be used for pangenome analysis.
This parameter currently takes the sum of MAGs and SUBs to a mOTU.

taxSort.description: Decides wich way to sort bins before clustering. Can lead to parallell clustering computation.
taxSort.help_text:
Options:
root: sends all bins to the clustering tool together.
auto: finds the lowest taxonomic rank where at least 90% of bins have been given a classification.
Possible taxonomic ranks: domain, phylum, class, order, family, genus and species.
